FFXIVTexTools2.log:
This is a small bugfix update to version 1.6 It includes all the changes in 1.6 with these additional fixes
Bug Fixes: - Fixed an issue where dae files with TexTools authoring tool were not able to be imported. - Fixed an issue where certain models with no extra data in mesh 0, but extra data in mesh 1 would not import and cause the application to crash. (eg. Makai Moon Guide's Quartertights)
